thread.title_full: London Bridge on lockdown over ‘police incident’

author: Jen
title: London Bridge on lockdown over ‘police incident’
text:
(Picture: Getty) London Bridge is on lockdown due to a ‘police incident’. 
The bridge is closed both ways, while trains are also not entering the station.
The exact nature of the problem is unclear but the bus station has also been closed off.
London Bridge is blocked both ways due to a police incident.
— TfL Traffic News (@TfLTrafficNews) March 7, 2017 

More follows.
